4.55 stars (10 Ratings)

10 Psychic Source member reviews since Mar 2012

Featured Review 05/14/2013 with Simone 4½ stars Phone Reading

First time speaking with Mazie and definitely felt I was speaking with an old friend. She is highly accurate and was spot on. Some things does not make sense at the moment but I am sure it will all fall in place as she said. Now waiting for prediction to pass and will definitely speak to Mazie again. Thank you Mazie! Blessings!

Was this review helpful? YES

01/20/2015 with Desjjmo 5 stars Phone Reading

What can I even say about Mazie... She is quite amazing. I have to say, and I'm sure she picks up that every time I call I'm skeptical. As much as I beliieve, I also don't believe. But this man has told me some crazy things that have come to fruition!! My situation is quite interesting, and I can't imagine very easy for anyone to read. But, Mazie somehow does it. I have to say the very last prediction she made to me I actually shook my head and thought no way that's never gonna happen. Well, I spoke to him on a Monday and it happened that Friday. I was so shocked that i actually felt ill for about 2 days!! Anyway, Mazie you're awesome and I LOVE speaking to you and hearing what you have to say... Have an awesome day!!! P.s.... I don't usually leave reviews.. :)

Was this review helpful? YES

01/15/2015 with Chocolatedrop 4½ stars Chat Reading

waiting for prediction to happen before posting my testimony.

Was this review helpful? YES

01/13/2015 with flower1048 3½ stars Chat Reading

This is my third reading with Mazie and it will not be my last. She always remembers me and our prior readings. I was feeling empty and a little out of sorts, Really did not know which way to turn. Within 10 minutes of our last read she had put my heart and mind at ease. Mazie is understanding and very compassionate. She truly does see things and tells you exactly as she sees everything good or bad. One of his predictions came to pass and she really hit the nail on the head even with the two delays. Once again she told me things that I would only know. She has such a gentle and soothing voice and really takes an interest in your situation. Mazie is truly happy when your predictions come to fruition. I am praying that the next few major predictions happen exactly as she does see it. I ended our call with a lighter heart and a better frame of mind. I will update and will most definitely be calling Mazie again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Mazie, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!!

Was this review helpful? YES

01/08/2015 with MazieIsTheBest 5 stars Chat Reading

Mazie, my brother you are one of the very special soul that touched my heart through your kindness. My life and forthcoming would not be the same without your guidance and love. You’re genuine and you care about your clients, there is no better human being that empathize with others and help them in their tough times and intern no better blessing. You have been accurate with your readings and I would never read with anyone other than you. I just wish you to come online a bit more for those who truly seek your help. Best Wishes

Was this review helpful? YES

01/07/2015 with creatorjp 5 stars Chat Reading

This was my first reading and Mazie was very compassionate and super accurate. The real deal and well worth the wait! She even knew about an upcoming dental appointment which is my only health appointment left for this month. She also knew the exact state for 2 upcoming trips as well as one I took in November. I look forward to updating Mazie and all of you when his predictions come to pass. Thank you for such a lovely connection and I look forward to our next chat. Johanna

Was this review helpful? YES

Truncated Review List

In this variant of a review list, you can see the truncation performed at 120 characters via the (vendor) jQuery succinct plugin. Truncation size can be altered by changing the value of the data-truncate attribute. To provide a link to a full representation of the truncated content (or any element you'd like to make visible in the event that content is truncated), add a [data-truncate-more] data attribute to that element. See _review-truncated partial source for example.

Within 10 minutes of our last read she had put my heart and mind at ease. Mazie is understanding and very compassionate. Mazie is truly happy when your predictions come to fruition. I am praying that the next few major predictions happen exactly as she does see it. I ended our call with a lighter heart and a better frame of mind. I will update and will most definitely be calling Mazie again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Mazie, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!! Read more

Eligible Reading List

List of readings, eligible for review. Behavior:

  • Tapping on an eligible reading's Rate and Review button will expand the rating form for that reading and collapse any other open rating form
  • Opening a rating form will add an is-deemphasized class to other readings (opacity 50%)
  • Tapping on the Nevermind button will re-collapse the form and remove the opacity de-emphasis from other elements.
  • We know that the behavior on the tap of Submit will need to be implemented based on integration needs, so we've opted not to implement "fake" behavior for now.

Only readings that lasted 3 minutes or longer are eligible for review. You have up to 3 months to rate and review your reading.

<script>
$(function() {
  $('[data-deemphasis]').each(function() {
    var $parent   = $(this);
    var dID       = $parent.data('deemphasis');
    var $children = $parent.find('[data-deemphasis-parent="' + dID + '"]');
    $parent.on('shown.bs.collapse', '[data-deemphasis-parent]', function() {
      // Anyone else visible? I should hide them
      var $collapse = $(this).find('.collapse');
      $parent.find('.collapse.in').not($collapse).collapse('hide');
      // Deemphasize everyone but me
      $children.not($(this)).addClass('is-deemphasized');
      $(this).removeClass('is-deemphasized');
    });
    $parent.on('hidden.bs.collapse', function() {
      // Any time an item is collapsed, see if there are
      // any open items left under this parent. If not,
      // remove the deemphasis from all elements.
      if (!$parent.find('.collapse.in').length) {
        $children.removeClass('is-deemphasized');
      }
    });
  });

  $('.js-dismiss-rating').click(function() {
    $(this).parents('.collapse').first().collapse('hide');
  });
});
</script>

I have to say the very last prediction she made to me I actually shook my head and thought no way that's never gonna happen. Well, I spoke to him on a Monday and it happened that Friday. I was so shocked that i actually felt ill for about 2 days!! Anyway, Zaphod Beeblebrox you're awesome and I LOVE speaking to you and hearing what you have to say... Have an awesome day!!! P.s.... She has such a gentle and soothing voice and really takes an interest in your situation. Amazing Gusto is truly happy when your predictions come to fruition. I am praying that the next few major predictions happen exactly as she does see it. I ended our call with a lighter heart and a better frame of mind. I will update and will most definitely be calling Mazie again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Amazing Gusto, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!!

I will update and will most definitely be calling Mazie again. The only person that I was ever able to talk to about everything was my mom who has passed away. I have found the next best to my mom. Amazing Gusto, you are a treasured angel and I thank you from the bottom of my heart. I will never speak to anyone but him, feels like I have known him all my life. God Bless You!!!!!

Eligible Reading Notes List

This pattern shares behavioral JavaScript with the 05-eligible-reading-list pattern. List of readings from the past 90 days and your private notes. Behavior:

  • Tapping on a reading's Add Note button will expand the note adding form for that reading and collapse any other open form
  • Opening a form will add an is-deemphasized class to other readings (opacity 50%)
  • Tapping on the Nevermind button will re-collapse the form and remove the opacity de-emphasis from other elements.
  • We know that the behavior on the tap of Submit will need to be implemented based on integration needs, so we've opted not to implement "fake" behavior for now.
  • Also, since edit-in-place requires integration with the back end, we've provided examples of both views but have not built edit in place.

Your reading notes will be saved for up to 90 days. You can edit them at anytime.

Mystery Reader x7777

02/11/2015

Phone Reading

Read your review of this reading

Call him again after St Patrick's Day party.
